title: ImageDrawQuadraticCurve
name: ImageDrawQuadraticCurve
description: Draws a curved line. The curve is controlled by a single point.

arguments.name: name
arguments.description: The image on which this operation is performed.

arguments.name: x1
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the start point of the quadratic curve segment.

arguments.name: y1
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the start point of the quadratic curve segment.

arguments.name: ctrlx
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the first control point of the quadratic curve segment.

arguments.name: ctrly
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the first control point of the quadratic curve segment.

arguments.name: x2
arguments.description: The x coordinate of the end point of the quadratic curve segment.

arguments.name: y2
arguments.description: The y coordinate of the end point of the quadratic curve segment.
